channel.title: Mastodon Home Timeline
channel.description: RSS feed for the Mastodon Home timeline

item.title: Pwnallthethings
item.description:
Musk spent more on the election than *all* small-dollar donations to Trump combined. His wealth went up in a day about 200x more than that. Bezos' personal wealth also went up by about 14x the total value of the entire of WaPo in a day.

RE: https://bsky.app/profile/did:plc:emhyi4kljodgqlusdsopgfgd/post/3lahsmd6qic2w

item.title: Shafik Yaghmour
item.description: Crazy graphic of the day.Wage theft greatly eclipses all other forms of theft value: https://www.tcworkerscenter.org/2018/09/wage-theft-vs-other-forms-of-theft-in-the-u-s/

item.title: Alistair Davidson
item.description: If you're talking about young men in online communities and not factoring in rates of neurodivergence you're missing something crucial.It's hard to find data, but eg 7% of board gamers have an autism diagnosis; 25% of incel forum users report an autism diagnosisvs 1% of the general population

item.title: Lori Emerson
item.description: SO GOOD. European alternatives for nearly all Amazon, Google, Microsoft products along with alts to Github, Slack, etc. now we need to create a North American version of this. thank you, @vortex! https://european-alternatives.eu/alternatives-to

item.title: Martin Holland
item.description:
Exactly two years ago, we started to post links on #Mastodon via our account @heiseonline ğŸ‘‡https://mastodon.social/@heiseonline/109314036284496776 It took longer, than I expected, but here we are: it seems like this account now brings continuously more #traffic to heise.de than #X (#Twitter) in its entirety, although it only has Â¼ of the follower number (and many of them don't seem to be active anymore).
I'll prepare some graphs after the weekend.#SocialMedia
#TwitterExodus
#MastodonMigration
#TwitterMigration
#Fediverse

item.title: Spencer LaVere Smith
item.description: There is less engagement on mastodon. And thatâ€™s okay. Probably a good thing.

item.title: Spencer LaVere Smith
item.description: topical

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: I wonder whether it will be possible to estimate how much Trump's victory owes to any particular issue or message, the economy, even racism and misogyny, compared to the volume of ambient media and messaging. Anecdotally, some voters clearly held quite erroneous, contradictory or meaningless views that it would be difficult to arrive at spontaneously. Of course, the simplistic narratives leverage effective emotional issues.

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: Analogously, one might question whether the progressive drift downwards of support for Brexit reflects a genuine change of conviction or simply the fact that it's no longer the focus of influence campaigns.

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: A propos. Carole Cadwalldr again. "... the problem is the pipes".https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2024/nov/11/a-new-era-dawns-americas-tech-bros-now-strut-their-stuff-in-the-corridors-of-power
